document: Adam optimizer uses adaptive learning rates and momentum terms.
SGD with momentum helps escape shallow local minima.
Learning rate scheduling can improve convergence and stability.
Gradient clipping prevents exploding gradients.
Gardening tips are unrelated to optimization algorithms.
Hinge loss enforces a margin between positive and negative scores.
Logistic pairwise loss models probability that positive outranks negative.
Sample weighting emphasizes more important training examples.
Hard negative mining can improve training efficiency.
Movie reviews are unrelated to pairwise loss.
Lowercasing and punctuation handling can affect tokenization.
Truncation and padding control maximum sequence length.
Deduplication reduces leakage from near-duplicate texts.
Normalization of unicode improves consistency.
Bird migration is unrelated to text preprocessing.
Batching multiple examples improves throughput on GPUs.
Mixed precision uses FP16 where safe to speed up compute.
Quantization reduces model size and may speed up CPU inference.
Caching encodings avoids redundant tokenization.
Mountain climbing tips are unrelated to inference.
FastAPI can host REST endpoints for model inference.
Pydantic validates request schemas for robustness.
Uvicorn runs ASGI apps efficiently with uvloop.
Health checks help monitor service availability.
Grocery lists are irrelevant to serving infra.
